p: Weighed, minced samples were placed in lysis buffer containing protease inhibitors for 24 hours at 4°C. Tissues were then homogenized, centrifuged to remove tissue residue, and the amount of epidermal growth factor (EGF), transforming growth factor (TGF)-β1, vascular endothelial growth factor (VEGF) in the lysis buffer was measured in diluted aliquots with standard ELISA assays.
